summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of Perfect Circle drawing game. Most core functionality working well with excellent user experience. Found two technical issues that need fixing.

critical_bugs.issue: Clipboard write permission denied error preventing copy feature from working
critical_bugs.error_message: Failed to execute 'writeText' on 'Clipboard': Write permission denied

ui_bugs.issue: Webpack dev server client overlay intercepts pointer events on Play Again button

passed_tests: Start screen loads with PERFECT SHAPE logo and correct text
Best Score displays 0.0% initially as expected
GO button successfully starts drawing state
Real-time score calculation and display (69.4%, 97.7%, 78.9% achieved in tests)
Failed state correctly triggers when releasing mouse early or incomplete circles
Try Again button works from failed state
Result screen appears for high-quality circles (97.7% score)
New best score indicator and localStorage saving works
Tweet button is functional and enabled
Mobile/touch support works correctly (390x844 viewport tested)
Visual design with neon glow effects renders properly
Sound effects integration present (Web Audio API)
Confetti celebration for new best scores
Responsive design works on both desktop (1920x1080) and mobile
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix clipboard permission issue for Copy button functionality and resolve webpack overlay interference with Play Again button clicks. Copy feature currently fails due to browser security restrictions.
success_percentage: frontend: 85% - Core game mechanics work perfectly, minor issues with copy functionality and dev overlay
